content.text: I just got back from a trip to Japan. It was very different from the US in many ways.
How so? Do you have any interesting stories from your trip?
The people were very polite, and the food was amazing. We went to a temple and saw a giant Buddha statue.
That sounds like an amazing trip! I would love to go to Japan someday.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! It was a really great experience.
What do you do for a living?
I work part time at a grocery store. I'm saving up for some procedures, and I'm trying to find ways to increase my income.
Oh, I see. That's good to hear that you're saving up for something.
Yeah, I'm hoping to get a nose job and some other procedures.
That's great! I hope you're able to get the procedures that you want.
Thank you! I'm really excited about it.
